vote.title: Reappointment of Jacquelin R. Lewis, J.D., Partner, Bricker & Eckler LLP, 100 South Third Street, Columbus, Ohio 43215, to serve on the Columbus Metropolitan Housing Authority Board of Commissioners, with a new term expiration date of December 31, 2029. (resume attached)
